title: Former President Ranil admitted to Prison Hospital
byline: Former President Ranil Wickremesinghe, who was arrested and remanded in custody on Friday over allegations he misused state funds while in office, has been admitted to the Prison Hospital on the advice of doctors, according to the Prisons Spokesman.

title: Island-wide postal strike enters day six
byline: The strike launched by postal workers will continue for the sixth consecutive day today (23).

title: Showers or thundershowers expected in several provinces after 2pm today
byline: Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in the Northern, North-Central, Central, Uva and Eastern provinces after 2:00 p.m. today (23), the Department of Meteorology said.

title: Voice of Dr. Nanda Malini is an intangible cultural heritage of this country – PM Harini
byline: A special felicitation program organized by the Sri Lanka Broadcasting Corporation (SLBC) in honor of Dr. Nanda Malini was held on August 22 at the Kumaranatunga Munidasa Hall of the Corporation, under the patronage of Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya.

title: Police OIC injured in van collision while on duty
byline: Kalutara North Police OIC, Chief Inspector Thushara Silva, was injured in a collision with a van while on special operations duty.

title: Several politicians visited Ranil last night following his remand
byline: Several politicians visited the Magazine New Remand Prison last night (22) following the remand of former President Ranil Wickremesinghe.

title: Ex-President Mahinda Rajapaksa visits Ranil in Prison Hospital
byline: Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa visited former President Ranil Wickremesinghe, who is currently admitted to the Prison Hospital.

title: Man charged with murder after Sri Lankan woman found dead in UK
byline: A 37-year-old man has been charged with murder after a Sri Lankan woman was found dead in a Cardiff street.

title: Sajith Premadasa visits ex-President Ranil in Prison Hospital
byline: Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa today visited former President Ranil Wickremesinghe, who is currently admitted to the Prison Hospital.

title: Social media predictions of legal outcomes are contempt of court - Sajith
byline: Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa claims that an individual making predictions on social media regarding the implementation of the law is an act of contempt of court.

title: Several coastal railway line train services cancelled and rescheduled
byline: Several train services have been cancelled and rescheduled today (August 23) and tomorrow (August 24) due to essential maintenance work on the Coastal Railway Line.

title: Govt’s actions are nothing but acts of revenge - Mahinda Rajapaksa
byline: Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa expressed his regret over the imprisonment of political leaders for minor offenses.

title: ‘I acted for the country, not personal gain,’ says Ranil before arrest
byline: Former President Ranil Wickremesinghe had stated, before being arrested by officers of the Criminal Investigation Department, that he acted for the country and not for personal matters.

title: TV Derana featured as case study in Prof. Philip Kotler’s ‘Essentials of Modern Marketing’
byline: The book ‘Essentials of Modern Marketing’ Sri Lanka and Maldives edition by the world-renowned Prof. Philip Kotler, featuring 20 Sri Lankan case studies, was launched last evening (22) with TV Derana also featured.

title: Former President Ranil transferred to Colombo National Hospital
byline: Former President Ranil Wickremesinghe, who was receiving treatment at the Prison Hospital, has been transferred to the Colombo National Hospital.

title: Ex-President Ranil to be transferred to Colombo National Hospital?
byline: Doctors have reportedly recommended that former President Ranil Wickremesinghe, who is currently receiving treatment at the Prison Hospital, be transferred to the Colombo National Hospital.

title: Police confirm probe against former Presidential Secretary over Ranil’s UK visit
byline: Sri Lanka Police have confirmed that investigations are currently underway regarding former Presidential Secretary Saman Ekanayake in connection with the approving of funds for the foreign visit of former President Ranil Wickremesinghe, who is presently in remand custody.

title: Opposition parties hold special discussion in Colombo
byline: A special discussion is currently underway in Colombo with the participation of opposition politicians and party leaders.

title: Ranil’s arrest will shift trajectory of Sri Lankan politics – MP Dilith
byline: The arrest and imprisonment of former President Ranil Wickremesinghe is an incident that will take Sri Lanka’s politics in a different direction, says Sarvajana Balaya leader, MP Dilith Jayaweera.

title: Ex-President Ranil granted permission to receive home-cooked meals
byline: Former President Ranil Wickremesinghe’s request to receive meals from home due to health reasons has been granted.

title: Notice issued on Arjuna Mahendran to appear before court
byline: The Colombo Magistrate’s Court has issued a notice on former Governor of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL), Arjuna Mahendran, who has been named as a suspect in the 2015 Central Bank bond scam, to appear before court on September 26.
